Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Cut the selected item
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 剪切所选项目

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Copy the selected item
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 复制所选项目

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Paste the selected item
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 粘贴所选项目

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Undo an action
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 撤销操作

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Switch between open apps
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在打开的应用程序之间切换

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Close the active item, or exit the active app
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 关闭活动项目或退出活动应用程序

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Lock your PC
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 锁定电脑

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Display and hide the desktop
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 显示和隐藏桌面

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Rename the selected item
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 重命名所选项目

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Search for a file or folder in File Explorer
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在文件资源管理器中搜索文件或文件夹

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Display the address bar list in File Explorer
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在文件资源管理器中显示地址栏列表

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Refresh the active window
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 刷新活动窗口

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Cycle through screen elements in a window or on the desktop
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在窗口或桌面上循环浏览屏幕元素

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Activate the Menu bar in the active app
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 激活活动应用程序的菜单栏

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Show your password on the sign-in screen
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在登录屏幕上显示密码

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Cycle through items in the order in which they were opened
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 按打开顺序循环浏览项目

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Perform the command for that letter
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 执行该字母的命令

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Display properties for the selected item
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 显示所选项目的属性

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Open the shortcut menu for the active window
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 打开活动窗口的快捷菜单

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Go back
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 后退

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Go forward
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 前进

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Move up one screen
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 上移一个屏幕

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Move down one screen
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 下移一个屏幕

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Close the active document (in apps that are full-screen and let you have multiple documents open at the same time)
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 关闭活动文档（在全屏应用程序中，允许同时打开多个文档）

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Select all items in a document or window
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 选择文档或窗口中的所有项目

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Delete the selected item and move it to the Recycle Bin
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 删除选中的项目并将其移至回收站

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Refresh the active window
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 刷新活动窗口

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Redo an action
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 重做操作

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next word
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 将光标移至下一个单词的开头

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Move the cursor to the beginning of the previous word
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 将光标移至上一个单词的开头

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next paragraph
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 将光标移至下一段的开头

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Move the cursor to the beginning of the previous paragraph
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 将光标移至上一段的开头

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Use the arrow keys to switch between all open apps
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 使用箭头键在所有打开的应用程序之间切换

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: When a group or tile is in focus on the Start menu, move it in the direction specified
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 当 “开始 ”菜单上的某个组或磁贴处于焦点时，按指定方向移动该组或磁贴

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: When a tile is in focus on the Start menu, move it into another tile to create a folder
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 当磁贴处于 “开始 ”菜单的焦点位置时，将其移动到另一个磁贴中以创建文件夹

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Resize the Start menu when it's open
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在 “开始 ”菜单打开时调整其大小

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Select multiple individual items in a window or on the desktop
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在窗口或桌面上选择多个单独的项目
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyValue: Ctrl + arrow key (to move to an item) + Spacebar

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Select a block of text
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 选择文本块
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyValue: Ctrl + Shift with an arrow key

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Open Start
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 打开 "开始

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Open Task Manager
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 打开任务管理器

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Switch the keyboard layout when multiple keyboard layouts are available
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在有多种键盘布局时切换键盘布局

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Turn the Chinese input method editor (IME) on or off
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 打开或关闭中文输入法编辑器（IME）

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Display the shortcut menu for the selected item
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 显示所选项目的快捷菜单

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Select more than one item in a window or on the desktop, or select text in a document
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 在窗口或桌面上选择多个项目，或在文档中选择文本

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Delete the selected item without moving it to the Recycle Bin first
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 删除所选项目，无需先将其移至回收站

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Open the next menu to the right, or open a submenu
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 向右打开下一个菜单，或打开一个子菜单

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Open the next menu to the left, or close a submenu
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 向左打开下一个菜单，或关闭一个子菜单

Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyName: Stop or leave the current task
Copy, paste, and other general keyboard.keyTrans: 停止或离开当前任务

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open or close Start
Open Action center
Set focus in the notification area
Open Cortana in listening mode
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 在监听模式下打开 Cortana

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the charms menu
Display and hide the desktop
Display and hide the date and time on the desktop
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 显示和隐藏桌面上的日期和时间

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open File Explorer
Open Feedback Hub and take a screenshot
Open Game bar when a game is open
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开游戏时打开游戏栏

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Start dictation
Open Settings
Set focus to a Windows tip when one is available.
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 将焦点设置为可用的 Windows 提示。

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the Connect quick action
Lock your PC or switch accounts
Minimize all windows
Lock device orientation
Choose a presentation display mode
Open the Run dialog box
Open search
Cycle through apps on the taskbar
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 循环浏览任务栏上的应用程序

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open Ease of Access Center
Cycle through notifications
Cycle through notifications in reverse order
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 以相反顺序循环浏览通知

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the Quick Link menu
Switch input between Windows Mixed Reality and your desktop
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 在 Windows 混合现实和桌面之间切换输入法

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Show the commands available in an app in full-screen mode
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 在全屏模式下显示应用中可用的命令

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open emoji panel
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Windows logo key  + period (.) or semicolon (;)

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Temporarily peek at the desktop
Display the System Properties dialog box
Search for PCs (if you're on a network)
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 搜索电脑（如果在网络中）

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Restore minimized windows on the desktop
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 恢复桌面上最小化的窗口

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the desktop and start the app pinned to the taskbar in the position indicated by the number. If the app is already running, switch to that app.
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开桌面，启动固定在任务栏上数字所示位置的应用程序。如果应用程序已在运行，请切换到该应用程序。

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the desktop and start a new instance of the app pinned to the taskbar in the position indicated by the number
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开桌面，在数字所示位置启动一个新的应用程序实例，该应用程序固定在任务栏上。

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the desktop and switch to the last active window of the app pinned to the taskbar in the position indicated by the number
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开桌面并切换到固定在数字所示位置的任务栏上的应用程序的最后一个活动窗口

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the desktop and open the Jump List for the app pinned to the taskbar in the position indicated by the number
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开桌面，并为固定在数字所示位置的任务栏上的应用程序打开跳转列表

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open the desktop and open a new instance of the app located at the given position on the taskbar as an administrator
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开桌面，然后以管理员身份打开位于任务栏给定位置的应用程序的新实例
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Windows logo key  + Ctrl + Shift + number

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open Task view
Maximize the window
Remove current app from screen or minimize the desktop window
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 从屏幕上删除当前应用程序或最小化桌面窗口

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Maximize the app or desktop window to the left side of the screen
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 将应用程序或桌面窗口最大化到屏幕左侧

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Maximize the app or desktop window to the right side of the screen
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 将应用程序或桌面窗口最大化到屏幕右侧

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Minimize all except the active desktop window (restores all windows on second stroke)
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 最小化除活动桌面窗口外的所有窗口（第二次点击时恢复所有窗口）

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Stretch the desktop window to the top and bottom of the screen
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 将桌面窗口拉伸到屏幕顶部和底部
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Windows logo key  + Shift + Up arrow

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Restore/minimize active desktop windows vertically, maintaining width
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 垂直恢复/最小化活动桌面窗口，保持宽度不变
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Windows logo key  + Shift + Down arrow

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Move an app or window in the desktop from one monitor to another
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 将桌面上的应用程序或窗口从一个显示器移动到另一个显示器
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Windows logo key  + Shift + Left arrow or Right arrow

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Switch input language and keyboard layout
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 切换输入语言和键盘布局

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Change to a previously selected input
Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 切换到先前选定的输入法

Windows logo key keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open Narrator
Begin IME reconversion
Open shoulder taps

Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Move the cursor in the direction specified
Move the cursor by one page up
Move the cursor by one page down
Move the cursor to the beginning of the buffer
Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 将光标移至缓冲区的起始位置

Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Move the cursor to the end of the buffer
Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 将光标移至缓冲区末尾

Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Move up one line in the output history
Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 在输出历史记录中上移一行

Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Move down one line in the output history
Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 在输出历史记录中向下移动一行

Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyName: If the command line is empty, move the viewport to the top of the buffer. Otherwise, delete all the characters to the left of the cursor in the command line.
Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 如果命令行为空，则将视口移至缓冲区顶部。否则，删除命令行中光标左侧的所有字符。

Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyName: If the command line is empty, move the viewport to the command line. Otherwise, delete all the characters to the right of the cursor in the command line.
Command Prompt keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 如果命令行为空，则将视口移至命令行。否则，删除命令行中光标右侧的所有字符。

Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Display the items in the active list
Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 显示活动列表中的项目
移动到第 n 个选项卡

Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Perform the command (or select the option) that is used with that letter
Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 执行与该字母对应的命令（或选择选项

Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Select or clear the check box if the active option is a check box
Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 如果活动选项是复选框，则选择或清除复选框

Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open a folder one level up if a folder is selected in the Save As or Open dialog box
Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 如果在 “另存为 ”或 “打开 ”对话框中选择了文件夹，则向上打开一级文件夹

Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Select a button if the active option is a group of option buttons
Dialog box keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 如果活动选项是一组选项按钮，则选择一个按钮

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Select the address bar
Select the search box
Select the search box
Open a new window
Close the active window
Change the size and appearance of file and folder icons
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 更改文件和文件夹图标的大小和外观

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Display all folders above the selected folder
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 显示所选文件夹上方的所有文件夹

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Create a new folder
Display all subfolders under the selected folder
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 显示所选文件夹下的所有子文件夹

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Display the contents of the selected folder
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 显示所选文件夹的内容

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Collapse the selected folder
Display the preview panel
Open the Properties dialog box for the selected item
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开所选项目的属性对话框

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: View the next folder
View the folder that the folder was in
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 查看该文件夹所在的文件夹

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: View the previous folder
View the previous folder
Display the current selection (if it's collapsed), or select the first subfolder
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 显示当前选中项（如果已折叠），或选择第一个子文件夹

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Collapse the current selection (if it's expanded), or select the folder that the folder was in
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 折叠当前选区（如果已展开），或选择文件夹所在的文件夹

File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Display the bottom of the active window
Display the top of the active window
Maximize or minimize the active window
File Explorer keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 最大化或最小化活动窗口

Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Switch between virtual desktops you’ve created on the right
Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 在右侧创建的虚拟桌面之间切换
Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Windows logo key  + Ctrl + Right arrow

Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Switch between virtual desktops you’ve created on the left
Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 在左侧创建的虚拟桌面之间切换
Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Windows logo key  + Ctrl + Left arrow

Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Close the virtual desktop you're using
Virtual desktops keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 关闭正在使用的虚拟桌面

Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open an app or quickly open another instance of an app
Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 打开应用程序或快速打开应用程序的另一个实例

Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Open an app as an administrator
Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 以管理员身份打开应用程序
Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Ctrl + Shift + click a taskbar button

Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Show the window menu for the app
Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyTrans: 显示应用程序的窗口菜单

Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Show the window menu for the group
Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Shift + right-click a grouped taskbar button

Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Cycle through the windows of the group
Taskbar keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Ctrl + click a grouped taskbar button

Settings keyboard shortcuts.keyName: Go back to the settings home page

Settings keyboard shortcuts.keyValue: Type on any page with search box

toolTrans: 复制、粘贴和其他常规快捷键
Windows 徽标键键盘快捷方式
文件资源管理器快捷键
